en.title: FE's Bangkok Event, 14th June 2008 (1).
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Bangkok at the 171 Thai Air force Convention Hall on 14th June 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS with over 1,000 Members, Leaders, VIP's, well known Actors, Actresses, Singers and Sports Personalities! 

Thank you Don Chan, FE's Thai Country Licensee for a wonderful job done!

Highlights of the Event Include:

- Opening Ceremony with Thai Military Marching Band carrying 4 Thai flags,
  4 Malaysian flags and 8 feet replica of FE's Quantum Pendant.

- 4 Region Cultural Show.

- Songs by 3 VI Chorus comprising well known singers Vinai Punthurat, Vichai Pooyayan and Prof. Virut   Yuthavorn.

- Opening Speech by General Dato Kitti Rattanashaya ( Former Thai Southern Region Army Commander).

- Speeches by KS Lee ( FE International Marketing Director and Founder)  and Don Chan ( Thai    Country    Licensee).

- Testimonial and Demos by Jean Daniels, International Long Drive Golf Specialist and FE Spokesman.

- Special Appearance by Child Golf Prodigy, Pisitchai Vordthaisong, who is representing Thailand in    the    prestigious World Junior Championships ( Under 9 year old category) in San Diego, 2008.    Pisitchai will    be wearing FE's QP. FE wishes Pisitchai good performance!

- Testimonials by QP Wearer, Ramazan Ramazanov ( World Heavyweight Muay Thai Champion ).

- Testimonials by QP Wearer, Zirdov Akuma ( Muay Thai Champion and Star of Contender Asia 
   2008 ).

- Speeches by Sam Ho ( Presidential Director ) and Rachel Thomas ( Presidential Director ).

- Speech  " Life Energy " by Prof. Dr. Vichit Bunyahotra M.D., FE's Thailand Medical Consultant.

- Testimonial by well known Newspaper Columnist, Sa-Ard Chundee.

- Demonstration by Presidential Director, KC Phoon lifting Ramazan weighing 95 kgs on stage.    Ramazan    was very impressed!

- Presentation of Quantum Pendants to Thai National Youth Soccer Team, Thai National Futsal Team    and   Thai National Weightlifting Team. 

- Presentation of Directors and Stockiest Awards by Paul Ting, FE CEO and Founder.

- Lucky Draws.

VIPs And Celebrities Who Attended Are:
 

- Mom Bongkojpriya Yugala

- Major General Jaroen Tachavanich

- Major General Khatiya Sawasdipol (Sae-Daeng)

- Police Major General Angkul Athorn Phatai

- Police Major General Piset Apirom Namakorn

- Sombat Methanee, Actor

- Rit Luasa, Actor

- Kesha Plianvithee, Actor

- Ampaa Phoosit, Actress

- Duang Shewan Kopmolsane, Actress

- Thewan Subsanyakorn, Father of Thai Jazz.

meta.description:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Bangkok at the 171 Thai Air force Convention Hall on 14th June 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS with over 1,000 Members, Leaders, VIP's, well known Actors, Actresses, Singers and Sports Personalities!
Thank you Don Chan, FE's Thai Country Licensee for a wonderful job done!
Highlights of the Event Include:
- Opening Ceremony with Thai Military Marching Band carrying 4 Thai flags, 4 Malaysian flags and 8 feet replica of FE's Quantum Pendant.
- 4 Region Cultural Show.
- Songs by 3 VI Chorus comprising well known singers Vinai Punthurat, Vichai Pooyayan and Prof. Virut Yuthavorn.
- Opening Speech by General Dato Kitti Rattanashaya ( Former Thai Southern Region Army Commander).
- Speeches by KS Lee ( FE International Marketing Director and Founder) and Don Chan ( Thai Country Licensee).
- Testimonial and Demos by Jean Daniels, International Long Drive Golf Specialist and FE Spokesman.
- Special Appearance by Child Golf Prodigy, Pisitchai Vordthaisong, who is representing Thailand in the prestigious World Junior Championships ( Under 9 year old category) in San Diego, 2008. Pisitchai will be wearing FE's QP. FE wishes Pisitchai good performance!
- Testimonials by QP Wearer, Ramazan Ramazanov ( World Heavyweight Muay Thai Champion ).
- Testimonials by QP Wearer, Zirdov Akuma ( Muay Thai Champion and Star of Contender Asia 2008 ).
- Speeches by Sam Ho ( Presidential Director ) and Rachel Thomas ( Presidential Director ).
- Speech " Life Energy " by Prof. Dr. Vichit Bunyahotra M.D., FE's Thailand Medical Consultant.
- Testimonial by well known Newspaper Columnist, Sa-Ard Chundee.
- Demonstration by Presidential Director, KC Phoon lifting Ramazan weighing 95 kgs on stage. Ramazan was very impressed!
- Presentation of Quantum Pendants to Thai National Youth Soccer Team, Thai National Futsal Team and Thai National Weightlifting Team.
- Presentation of Directors and Stockiest Awards by Paul Ting, FE CEO and Founder.
- Lucky Draws.
VIPs And Celebrities Who Attended Are:
- Mom Bongkojpriya Yugala
- Major General Jaroen Tachavanich
- Major General Khatiya Sawasdipol (Sae-Daeng)
- Police Major General Angkul Athorn Phatai
- Police Major General Piset Apirom Namakorn
- Sombat Methanee, Actor
- Rit Luasa, Actor
- Kesha Plianvithee, Actor
- Ampaa Phoosit, Actress
- Duang Shewan Kopmolsane, Actress
- Thewan Subsanyakorn, Father of Thai Jazz.
